name: Swordies
description:
Swordies

where you buy boring boxes to get awesome weapons to earn profit!

this game is purely experimental, I'd like to make this an actual game with more weapons, features, more stuff in general if you think you like it. :D

Gameplay:

- Click the huge main panel to earn coins per click!

- Visit the shop to see all available boxes for sale.

Updates:

- fixed bug where player can buy ten boxes with less gold.
